title: Historic Apartment Investment Opportunity in Krosno’s Old Town
description: Set within one of Krosno’s most storied streets, this charming 2-bedroom apartment of 63 sqm beautifully merges historic architecture with modern conveniences. The generous living space includes a guest bathroom, co-working station, and panoramic views of classic rooftops. Found on an upper floor of a well-secured tenement, amenities such as 24/7 security and a fenced yard elevate both comfort and peace of mind. The layout balances authenticity with functionality, granting effortless room flow for daily living or short-stay rentals.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Krosno’s Old Town, an enclave of cobbled calm, the neighborhood radiates historic charm and quiet sophistication. Well-known for hosting an artistic community, local galleries, and unique artisan cafes, this safe area appeals not only to creative spirits but those seeking a slower pace yet rapid connection to the surrounding region via direct highway access.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to art and culture
target_buyer: Ideal for property investors looking to add a statement asset in a quaint and charismatic small-town Polish market, or those aiming to tap into the growing demand for boutique rentals.
market_positioning: Positioned as a unique addition in Krosno's rapidly appreciating historic center, this apartment stands out for its blend of period looks and contemporary safeguards, making it an attractive turnkey investment.
